name: NUTZ!
description:
NUTZ! is a 2D sidescrolling platformer in which the player controls a squirrel trying to make his way home to his family. Along the way, they will need to collect acorns to help with progression as well as bring some home to the squirrel's family. This is a single-level prototype created for a University submission in 2021.

Download the file, unzip and click on the .exe file within to play the game.
